abstract: Pizza parties, treasure hunts and programming contests are meant to create excitement around a company and impress potential recruits as young as college freshmen.
snippet: Pizza parties, treasure hunts and programming contests are meant to create excitement around a company and impress potential recruits as young as college freshmen.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. — On a spring Saturday, about 90 students from Stanford and as many from the University of California, Berkeley, converged on Google’s corporate campus for a day of spirited team competition over mind-bending puzzles, Lego building problems and video games.

headline.main: In Fierce Competition, Google Finds Novel Ways to Feed Hiring Machine
headline.print_headline: In Fierce Competition, Google Finds Novel Ways to Feed Hiring Machine
